My Journey

Welcome to My Body My Beautiful. My belief is that we all have beautiful bodies and we need to get out of our heads and into our beautiful bodies to really appreciate our selves. I love doing this through yoga and meditation, sprinkled with a healthy dose of fun, dancing, great food and wine. I started my journey ... Continue reading
